summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 65th Street, and certain other streets, avenues, and alleys by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15762 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district paybale by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
